name: Satellite Damage
description:
Satellite Damage

The year is 2105. New technologies have accelerated space exploration and brought space travel to the masses. However, there remains one major barrier: space debris.

In this all-new VR experience, you the player are transported into low-level orbit around the Earth. You will take part in an initiative to clean up space debris ahead of a pending rocket launch. The aim of the initiative is to extend the service life of functioning satellites, and to remove non-functioning satellites from orbit. By doing so, we hope to reduce the need to deploy new satellites and minimize the physical barrier between the Earth and the rest of space.

Join the initiative today and prepare the way for the future of space travel!

Developed by team Emotional Damage for Immersive Environments project

  • Evan Huang
  • Tung Huynh
  • Ivan Lee
  • Kaitlyn Lam
  • Nika Styk
  • Leo Xiong
